Detailed Description

MGIgesPD126 is the class for Iges parameter data type 126(NURBS).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void MGIgesPD126::write_out_into_string ( const MGIgesGSec &  gsec,
MGPvector< std::string > &  plines 
) const [virtual]

Write out this PD as MGIgesParamLine's(into plines).

Except for string data, one integer or double data is output into one MGIgesParamLine, not striding over more than one line. Only when string data is output(to Holleris string), the data may stride over more than one lines. plines[i] for 0<=i<plines.size() are valid.

Parameters:
gsec Input gsec to input delimeter_param and delimeter_record;
plines output plines.

Implements MGIgesPD.

Member Data Documentation

double MGIgesPD126::m_end_param

Starting and ending parameters, that is,.

m_start_param=m_knots[m_degree], or m_start_param=m_knots[order-1]. m_end_param=m_knots[nBrep],

int MGIgesPD126::m_upper_index

Here we denote nBrep=m_upper_index+1, order=m_degree+1 (nBrep is B-Representation dimension of B-Spline).

Upper index of sum, that is, m_upper_index=nBrep-1.
